attributes.action: Make it illegal for MPs to profit off there position in power......
attributes.background: Mps should not be allowed to invest in companys that are replacing goverment services.. thus profitering off the sale off of goverment services

rejection.details:
The House of Commons has a Code of Conduct for MPs. MPs are already required to register and declare financial interests, and to avoid conflicts of interest.

You can find the Code of Conduct for the House of Commons here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/code-of-conduct-and-rules-of-the-house/

If you'd like a specific change to the Code of Conduct, you could start a new petition asking clearly for that change.
